channel.title: [PI]Adding a command to display an interface to everyone on the server
channel.description:
need help making a command that will show up an interface and string text to everyone on the server
for example,
a mod types in
::alert show this text
then an interface pops up with the text "show this text" printed on it
any ideas?

item.title: [PI]Adding a command to display an interface to everyone on the server
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]There’s tutorials over on R-S.

Try Googling it.[/quote]

not much help and ive been through many pages on r-s, mopar, and a bunch of other sites, as well as trying many different searches on google, after over an hour of unsuccessful searches, i decided to come here as a last resort in hopes that someone might help me or even point me in the right direction of a code snippet that is similar to this…

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Adding a command to display an interface to everyone on the server
